name: Helico Sonoma
baseAirport: STS -Charles M Schulz - Sonoma County Airport
about: Helico Sonoma, established in 2014, is a comprehensive helicopter training facility and touring operation based at Sonoma County Charles Schulz Airport in Santa Rosa, California. Our Chief Pilot and CEO, Dan King, leads a team with over 13 years of combined flight experience. We offer structured training programs in Robinson R44 and R22 helicopters, focusing on safety and professionalism. Our services extend to helicopter maintenance, firefighting, law enforcement support, and various aerial services. With a commitment to safety and excellence, we provide professional and courteous instruction for those seeking helicopter licenses or certifications. Our scenic tours cover the North Bay and Northern California, offering a unique flying experience. Contact us to embark on your aviation journey with confidence and fun.
